00018 using namespace std;

00020 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) 
00021 {
00022 
00023         cout << "Welcome to Fill Event" << endl;
00024         
00025         TFile f("new.root","recreate");
00026         cout << "Open Root File" << endl;
00027         
00028         KHLAEvent *mEv = new KHLAEvent();
00029         cout << "Created KHLAEvent" << endl;
00030         
00031         TTree *t = new TTree("KT","KEventTree");
00032         cout << "Created TTree" << endl;
00033         
00034         t->Branch("KHLAEventBranch","KHLAEvent",&mEv,32000,99); 
00035         //t->BranchRef(); //creates an extra Branch table filled with Branches that have TRefs or TRefArrays
00036         cout << "Set Branch new.root and filling events" << endl;
00037         
00038         gRandom->SetSeed(0);
00039         Int_t numEvents = 70000 + (Int_t)20000*gRandom->Rndm();
00040         cout <<"Will create " << numEvents << " events" << endl;
00041         Bool_t bIsBoloEvent, bIsMuonEvent; 
00042         for(Int_t i = 0; i < numEvents; i++){
00043                 bIsBoloEvent = bIsMuonEvent = false;
00044                 if((i % 2000) == 0) 
00045                         cout << i << " events filled" << endl;
00046                 mEv->SetRunNumber(i);
00047                 //mEv->SetDataCleaningWord(4);
00048                 mEv->SetEventTime(3.023432*i);
00049                 mEv->SetGSEventNumber(3*i+1994);
00050                 //5% chance of a Muon event... which is probably way too huge.
00051                 if(gRandom->Rndm() < 0.05){
00052                         Int_t nMod = 1 + (Int_t)(3*gRandom->Rndm());
00053                         mEv->GetHLAMuonVetoSysRecord()->SetIsMuonSystemOn(true);
00054                         mEv->GetHLAMuonVetoSysRecord()->SetRunNumber(63);
00055                         mEv->GetHLAMuonVetoSysRecord()->SetRunStartTime(1257638400);  //Nov 8, 2009 at 00:00
00056                         mEv->GetHLAMuonVetoSysRecord()->SetRunEndTime(1270512000);  //April 6, 2010 at 00:00
00057                         
00058                         for(Int_t i = 0; i < nMod; i++) {
00059                                 bIsMuonEvent = true;
00060                                 KHLAMuonModuleSubRecord* mMuonModule = mEv->AddMuonModule();
00061                                 mMuonModule->SetModuleNumber(40*gRandom->Rndm());
00062                                 mMuonModule->SetAdc(0,(Int_t)(2048*gRandom->Rndm()));
00063                                 mMuonModule->SetAdc(1,(Int_t)(2048*gRandom->Rndm()));
00064                                 //mMuonModule->SetRelativeEventTime(0,200.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00065                                 //mMuonModule->SetRelativeEventTime(1,mMuonModule->GetRelativeEventTime(0) + 200.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00066                                 mMuonModule->SetEnergy(0,(Int_t)(2048*gRandom->Rndm()/1.0e6)); //divide by 1 MeV...?
00067                                 mMuonModule->SetEnergy(1,(Int_t)(2048*gRandom->Rndm()/1.0e6));
00068                         }
00069 
00070                 }
00071                 else {
00072                         Int_t nBolo = 1 + (gRandom->Poisson(0.95));
00073                         for (Int_t i = 0; i < nBolo; i++) {
00074                                 bIsBoloEvent = true;
00075                                 KHLASingleBoloSubRecord* mBolo2 = mEv->AddSingleBolo();
00076                                 
00077                                 mBolo2->SetQvalue(gRandom->Rndm());
00078                                 mBolo2->SetEnergyRecoil(100.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00079                                 mBolo2->SetEnergyIon(100.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00080                                 mBolo2->SetEnergyHeat(100.0*gRandom->Rndm());
00081                                 
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084                 t->Fill();
00085                 //must now clear the event so that the TClonesArrays are cleared
00086                 //and their objects are deleted. 
00087                 if(bIsBoloEvent || bIsMuonEvent) mEv->Clear();  
00088         }
00089         cout << "Done filling events." << endl;
00090         t->Write();
00091         cout << "Write Tree" << endl;
00092         f.Close();
00093         cout << "Closing File" << endl;
00094         delete mEv;
00095         cout << "Clean up KHLAEvent object " << endl;
